website_summaries.verdict: Those that are not genuinely familiar with the brand would be delighted to know that there are more sneaker options available. The TOMS TRVL LITE Low may be another canvas pair, but its design deviates from the slip-on that the TOMS brand has been known for. While basic-looking, its versatility, performance, and comfort are truly enjoyed by many.
pros: A high number of consumers are satisfied with the performance of TOMS TRVL LITE as it is comfortable
Some claimed that they were able to walk for long hours in these without foot pain
A handful of those on the heavier side was surprised that these can hold up well
Several of those who commented were pleased with these TOMS TRVL LITE’s low-top design
A TOMS newbie was delighted to find a great brand because of this model
One was astonished by its quality given its affordable price tag
The attention to detail is something that was not neglected according to some of the wearers
A couple of users complimented how lightweight these sneakers are
cons: Though generally pleased with the shoe, the only drawback that one noticed was the comically long shoelaces
One TOMS TRVL LITE Low review stated disappointment that the left heel squeaks on every step

customer_reviews.title: Love me my toms
customer_reviews.text: With the current COVID situation our work has allowed us to dress a bit more business casual. I wear these shoes nearly every day and I’m required to be standing the entire time. Super comfy! I would by other colors if I could
customer_reviews.author: adrian

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but they squeak like no other.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, well made and comfortable, but they are the loudest, squeakiest shoes I've ever had. Its embarrassing walking through our quiet halls at work. Guess they're going in the beater shoe pile.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews I decided to order a half size larger and they fit very well. My feet are on the wider side even though I can wear most normal width shoes without much concern. I've walked about 10 miles on sidewalk in these in the past few weeks and they've felt light and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Well priced good quality product
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift. It arrived quickly and in perfect condition. Recipient was excited and pleased
customer_reviews.author: Exiled

customer_reviews.title: Nice camo shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice color but no arch support. I still like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Miss E

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, light, nice looking sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I loved my first set of Tom’s canvas sneakers and this pair is just as great! I’ve gotten compliments on them, which never happened with leather sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: MGM

customer_reviews.title: Great comfy kicks!
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit hesitant with this shoe as the last Toms shoes I purchased had little to no cushioning. The footbed on this particular style is great.....plenty of cushion and a nice soft ride.
customer_reviews.author: Brad B.

customer_reviews.title: These are MEN's shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The description is completely wrong. These are men's shoes. I liked them, however they were ginormous. Sending back. Irritated with Amazon for wasting my time.
customer_reviews.author: phiredupphatty

customer_reviews.title: Look good, but aren't very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look good but the canvas is very stiff so it isn't very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Casual Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes for casual day to day wearing, really good, highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is comfortable, but after less than a year of regular daily use, they’re covered in holes and torn up. Durability for an $80 shoe should be higher.
